mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_COMMENT (COMMENT_NO, GAL_NO, ID, COMMENT_TITLE, COMMENT_CREATE_DATE, COMMNET_LAST_MODIFY_DATE, IP) VALUES (TBL_COMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{galNo}, #{id}, #{commentTitle}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{ip})
mapper.select: SELECT A.ROW_NUM, A.COMMENT_NO, A.COMMENT_NO, A.GAL_NO, A.ID, A.COMMENT_TITLE, A.COMMENT_CREATE_DATE, A.COMMNET_LAST_MODIFY_DATE, A.IP FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GAL_NO DESC) AS ROW_NUM, COMMENT_NO, GAL_NO, ID, COMMENT_TITLE, COMMENT_CREATE_DATE, COMMNET_LAST_MODIFY_DATE, IP FROM TBL_COMMENT WHERE GAL_NO = #{galNo}) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
